 Expands to the concatenation of its two arguments.
 
#define BOOST_HANA_PP_STRINGIZE(...)   BOOST_HANA_PP_STRINGIZE_PRIMITIVE(__VA_ARGS__)
 Expands to the stringized version of its argument.
